data.name: Maid Cafe ~Full Service~
data.detailed_description:
Story

Tired from work?
Want to be healed?
Now is your time to come to our establishment!
Play with our classic maid from the 2000 eras style and the boss that will give you a bit of spice in your life!
Yakyuuken, Kakurenbo, Daruma-san, Makuranage, and Moe-Moe Kyun!

Gameplay


The game has 5 minigames :
- Strip rock paper scissors where if you win you will get those pieces of clothing off one by one
- Hide and seek where you must search for the maid hiding in the store to get her to reward you
- Red light green light where you must stop when the maid says so and reach for the goal
- Reverse tower defense where you must reach the goal when getting shoot from every direction possible
- lastly the game is about following the maid's directions to make your meal yummier

Features


- 5 minigames that will give you many options of clothing!
- 2 unique heroine with their own story
- 7 maids to play with every day
- pregnancy incoming(?)

data.short_description: The old style of playing service games from the famous maid cafe! Strip rock paper scissors, hide and seek, and other classics with awesome rewards from the maids!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ 3.20 GHz or Intel Core2 Duo E6850 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 3.20 GHz or Intel Core i5-760 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Any

content_descriptors.notes: This game has a lot of fun ecchi time with monster girls that escaped from the lab, and make them submit is the agreement for them to return.
